about_the_game:
the Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer Original Soundtrack is here.... thanks to everyone who were making fun of my page... now my comics are so famous that:
Seepage,
Gurrgle,
Psyko Syndicate, &
Vesperum Lacrimae
wanted to be on the soundtrack. some of the most famous bands in the world & now they work for Big Z.

theres also some music I ripped from Katakclysm by J. Walker & Linda Carr.... but its old so its not illegal. Linda did do some originals too for some parts. some other music was by my uncle Frank (RIP) but i didnt put the songs in here because I just put them in the game to be nice... in the butt ride part. i think thats it.
